price: [¡Oh, Mujámmad!] Tengo poder para hacerte ver el castigo que les he destinado.
arabic: وَإِنَّا عَلَىٰٓ أَن نُّرِيَكَ مَا نَعِدُهُمۡ لَقَٰدِرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-innā ʿalā an nuriyaka mā naʿiduhum laqādirūna
